summary: This document is a chain of email correspondence from 2020-2021 between Gary Stein, a partner at Schulte Roth & Zabel LLP, and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding scheduling a call and a subpoena for records from the Professional Children's School (PCS) related to Jeffrey Epstein. The prosecutor is seeking records of third-party payments, donations, or sponsored scholarships from 1997-2000 connected to Epstein.

persons.name: Gary Stein
persons.role: Partner at Schulte Roth & Zabel LLP
persons.context: Attorney communicating with a federal prosecutor regarding a subpoena for records from the Professional Children's School related to Jeffrey Epstein. He is scheduling calls and responding to inquiries about financial records.

persons.name: Elizabeth Sullivan
persons.context: Federal prosecutor copied on emails, involved in the investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein and seeking records from the Professional Children's School.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named as the subject of a subpoena for records from the Professional Children's School regarding potential third-party payments, donations, or sponsored scholarships from 1997-2000.

connections.description: Attorney and federal prosecutor communicating regarding a subpoena and investigation related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Attorney is the point of contact for a school (PCS) from which prosecutors are seeking records related to Epstein's potential financial transactions.
Prosecutor is investigating Epstein, specifically seeking financial records from a school potentially connected to him.

events.title: Prosecutor inquiry about Epstein-related school records
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney follows up on a voicemail from Gary Stein, asking if the Professional Children's School has records from 1997-2000 of third-party payments, donations, or sponsored scholarships relating to Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Scheduling of call regarding PCS records
events.description: Gary Stein and a prosecutor finalize scheduling a call for Thursday, November 18, 2021, at 5:30 PM, regarding the Professional Children's School matter.

keyFacts: Federal prosecutors were investigating potential financial connections between Jeffrey Epstein and the Professional Children's School (PCS).
The investigation sought records from PCS for the period 1997 to 2000, specifically for third-party payments, donations, sponsored scholarships, or similar financial transactions relating to Epstein.
Gary Stein, a partner at the law firm Schulte Roth & Zabel LLP, acted as the contact point for PCS regarding the subpoena and coordinated communication with the U.S. Attorney's Office.
The email chain shows active investigation into Epstein's affairs was ongoing as of late 2021, years after his death.
